title: Olive Tree Hummus Express
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small and cozy restaurant close to the Hungarian State Opera House serves 90% vegetarian and vegan dishes. Specializes in hummus (made-in-house daily), plenty of salads, vegetarian soups, and many take away items. Falafel is baked, not fried in oil.
